ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk.util

Class VirtualDiskUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.vdisk.util.VirtualDiskUtil

  • public class VirtualDiskUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to work with a VirtualDisk. This class provides some static methods for convenience and to prevent code duplication.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualDiskUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IVirtualDiskEntry getDirectoryMember(IVirtualDirectory directory, String name)
      Searches the IVirtualDiskEntry whose parent is the given IVirtualDirectory directory and has the given name.

      Returns all members as a collection of names.
      static Collection<IVirtualDiskEntry> getDirectoryMembers(IVirtualDirectory directory)
      Returns a collection of members of a directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualDiskUtil

        public VirtualDiskUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • getDirectoryMembers

        public static Collection<IVirtualDiskEntry> getDirectoryMembers(IVirtualDirectory directory)
                                                         throws IOException
        Returns a collection of members of a directory. A member of a directory is a IVirtualDiskEntry that belongs to the given directory. Therefore this method returns children of the given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the parent directory of the returned members
        Returns:
        a collection of members which are children of the given directory
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an IOException of the underlying virtual disk

      • getDirectoryMember

        public static IVirtualDiskEntry getDirectoryMember(IVirtualDirectory directory,
                                   String name)
                                            throws IOException
        Searches the IVirtualDiskEntry whose parent is the given IVirtualDirectory directory and has the given name. This method may return null if no entry was found.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory in which to search for the given name
        name - the name to search inside the directory
        Returns:
        a IVirtualDiskEntry if the member was found, otherwise null
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an IOException of the underlying virtual disk

      • getDirectoryMemberNames

        public static Collection<String> getDirectoryMemberNames(IVirtualDirectory directory)
                                                  throws IOException
        Returns all members as a collection of names. Works the same way as getDirectoryMembers(IVirtualDirectory). May return an empty list if no members were found.
        Parameters:
        directory - the parent directory of the returned members
        Returns:
        a list of member names or null if none found
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an IOException of the underlying virtual disk
        See Also:
        getDirectoryMembers(IVirtualDirectory)
